reviews.text: Elite Plumbing Pros saved us during a late-night emergency. Their technician arrived within 30 minutes and fixed our burst pipe.

reviews.text: Best plumbing service in Phoenix! Fair prices and excellent work quality.

reviews.text: Very reliable service. Had them fix multiple issues in our older home.

site79.businessName: Evans Plumbing and Drain Service, Inc.

heroImages.text: Evans Plumbing and Drain Service, Inc. - Trusted plumbing in Eight Mile
24/7 Emergency Services by Evans Plumbing and Drain Service, Inc.. Call now!

reviews.name: Evans Plumbing and Drain Service, Inc.
reviews.text:
Russell Hammontree
3 reviews?5 photos
2 weeks agoNew
I posted a request for a local plumber for an RV Leak . Most residential businesses shy away from this because of the aggregation and difference between RV and residential .
5 minutes after my post I got a call from Evans Plumbing . I was told that they could help me out ? sometime ? after lunch
I realized that they were busy and already doing other scheduled projects . I was told they would be able to help me sometime after lunch . Well . Got a call at 5:30 pm  , Nick , with Evans Plumbing is at my driveway gate .  ?  What , ??  I used to own my own construction business , by 5:30pm I wanted to be at home with my family ( and beer ) .
He started the project and refused to stop and make a return visit the next day ! Extremely a professional attitude ! And much more patience with confined space and aggravating work situations than I have !
He took care of the problem and did an excellent job !!
I highly recommend EVANS PLUMBING !!!
Like
Rachel Leard
Rachel Leard
5 reviews
4 months ago
Super, super nice guys. When I called, the gentleman who answered the phone answered all of my (crazy) questions with uncomplicated answers, and was very helpful! Prompt response time and had the job done in less than an hour!

I recommend this company above all other plumbing companies in Mobile County!!!

Great service!! Professional, timely, reasonable and did a great job!! Will definitely be using this company again! Thanks so much for all the help!

reviews.name: Simone Ali
reviews.text: 6 months ago I had a terrible leak in my home and it caused the plumber to have to cut holes in the ceiling and walls in order to locate the leak.  The water damaged my upstairs and downstairs flooring.  I called Jay's and not only did they jump right in to help, they completed this complex job in just a week.  They also worked with the Insurance company on my behalf for my claim.  They did a Great Job!!!!  My house looks great.  They even removed the popcorn texture in my Dining room and Kitchen and it looks awesome.  I recommend them to anyone that needs their help in water damage repair or any other repairs or improvements.  They also Really care for their customers.  Thanks to Jay's Home Improvement for making my home livable again!

reviews.name: Gloria Foster
reviews.text: a year ago Jay and his crew fully renovated a home for a family member of mine! My wife and I oversaw the project. They were professional, timely, business oriented, receptive to our needs, and did an outstanding job! Jay was very prompt with his replies by email or text. I highly recommend them! Than you Janet Janet 1 review 10 months ago Jay did a wonderful job on my floors.  I had a flood in my entire home and he jumped in  and got my job done very quick and it looks beautiful!  Thank you, Jay for a job well done!  I really appreciate you! Thank you Miss Janet, and if you need anything else please don't hesitate to give us a call

reviews.name: Heather
reviews.text: 5 reviews 9 months ago We have always been able to count on Marty Williams for our hvac needs - from repairing our old system, to installing our new system, and even coming out to our home after the ice storm when our downstairs furnace stopped working in frigid weather.  Marty got us on the schedule lightning fast for spring maintenance. Aaron came out today, thoroughly checked our systems, and answered all my questions. He was very kind. Marty is also a super nice guy and very honest. We're thankful we found Williams Air! Like J M J M 9 months ago Williams Air Conditioning & Refrigeration always does prompt and professional work at fair and reasonable prices.   Marty and his team have done work for me personally at my home and at my rental property. Highly recommend! Like Virginia Smith Virginia Smith Local Guide?401 reviews?113 photos 6 months ago Very professional. On time and delivered excellent service with an outstanding crew.  Cleaned up afterwards,  took precautions to keep my home clean, put up with the dogs and kids. Would recommend! Like Dan Luther Dan Luther 3 reviews 11 months ago Referred by our realtor to Marty and he really helped us out  - couldn't get our gas heat going in older home we purchased that had been sitting vacant for a while.  Saved me a service call by talking me through how to turn on gas at meter - honest guy, will definitely remember him for all future HVAC needs! Like Benjamin Winslett Benjamin Winslett 24 reviews a year ago We use them at my home and at church and they are always prompt, professional, and their prices are very reasonable. Services HVAC system maintenance, HVAC duct & vent repair, Repair HVAC

reviews.name: David Hinds
reviews.text: a year ago Bought puppy wormer. They were educated on what I needed for my puppies. I did need some all in one shots as well, but they were out of stock at the time. I would Def. Recommend they keep things like this in stock and in date to continue good business. Great service. Reasonable prices.

reviews.name: Scott Crawford
reviews.text: 4 years ago Very please with the septic service. The guys got in and out quickly, pumped the system, and were willing to answer questions. Will happily use them again for servicing my septic systems. Like Response from the owner4 years ago Thank you! Tripp Salem Tripp Salem 6 reviews 5 years ago Fantastic service!  I called Absolute Environmental for service and they arrived at my house the following day exactly on time.  Jason and David were extremely professional and patient with me as I have no prior experience with septic tanks.  They are clearly experts in their field and were extremely courteous and thorough with their work, not to mention they left my yard very clean after finishing.  I would highly recommend Absolute Environmental based on the service I received from Jason and David.  I will be using this company for my future septic tank and plumbing needs.   Keep up the good work! Like Response from the owner5 years ago Thank you! K Franklin K Franklin Local Guide?16 reviews 4 years ago Wonderful! Fair prices and excellent service. I called them late on Friday evening and Craig and Deon ( I think that was his name) were out to us by 11am Saturday-in the rain. We are so thankful for them and their knowledge and dedication! I will recommend them to others and will use them in the future! Like Response from the owner4 years ago Thank you!! Joshua Carson Joshua Carson 6 reviews 4 years ago I have worked exclusively with Absolute Environmental since we bought our home in 2017.  I feel fortunate to have such an easy to work with, professional company to count on for what is such an important and necessary service.  I most appreciate that they are straight-shooters and take the time to explain whatever situation or answer any question I may have.  I also appreciate their readiness for whatever type of call they might get.  They come ready to pump and/or dig every time.   I highly encourage anyone who needs their services to give them a call.

site21.businessName: Mamas Boy Plumbing and Septic LLC

reviews.name: Shawn Hunter
reviews.text: Cody changed 2 drains out in my bathtubs that were difficult to get to. He kept me informed every step of the way as to what was going on with my plumbing, and showed me pictures of what was going on under the house. Really nice man. I feel like I got good value for my money. He was also really patient with my old, cranky dog that hates visitors. He was respectful of my home, he tried his best to keep it clean despite being covered in dirt from crawling under the house. He left his boots outside without me having to ask. I will use this company again in the future for whatever issues may arise. Positive Quality

reviews.name: Madison Burroughs
reviews.text: 1 review My kitchen and bathroom sink was backing up and I reached out to Cody. Within seconds he called me back and immediately came to check it out! He had it fixed right off the bat and everything is working perfectly now! I can?t believe how perfect of service he provided for us! 10/10 highly recommend him! Sweetest guy ever! Positive Responsiveness, Punctuality, Quality, Professionalism, Value

reviews.name: Valerie Cunningham
reviews.text: 1 review I would one thousand percent recommend this business to everybody. Cody came out and fixed a problem with my water filtration system which was affecting the water throughout my home. He was friendly, professional, and he worked super hard to fix our problem. I wouldn't recommend anyone else. Thank you Cody!

reviews.name: Cherise Charris
reviews.text: 5 months ago This was our first interaction with this company and it was definitely the right call!!  From scheduling the appointment to finalizing payment, the whole process was quick & easy.  We only had to wait a few days for a routine appointment and Jeremy, the tech who responded to our home, was very friendly & professional.  He completed the work in a fraction of the time we expected, updated me on the status of the septic system & answered all my questions.  For their professionalism & courteous customer service, I absolutely recommend AJ?s!! joey watters joey watters a year ago M Love M Love a year ago Super nice folks that did a great job. We're moving into a new home and they were quick with scheduling, they call back when they miss your call and they show up on time and ready to help. We had some confusion with the sellers on the exact location of the tank and they were kind enough to work with our real estate agent and came back out shortly to get everything taken care of. Highly recommended. Susan Susan a year ago They were quick to respond.  We set a date but they were not sure what time they would be able to get to me. I work 30 minutes away so ( I believe it was Jeremy) contacted me by phone telling me he was heading to my house and understood that I worked 30 minutes away. We discussed what needed to completed. He stated he would call me back when he was finishing up to give me time to drive home.  I was contacted as told.  When I arrived we discussed everything, all my questions were answered and I was extremely pleased with the job and the information. I would highly recommend AJ's septic to anyone especially at a time when it is very difficult to get anyone to call you back or to actually show up to do the work.  Jeremy did a wonderful job. Positive Responsiveness, Punctuality, Quality, Professionalism, Value mystie mcglone mystie mcglone a year ago When we noticed some stinky water at the edge of our yard we called another service first who quoted us astronomical amounts to cut up our concrete and replace field lines. AJ's came & pumped our septic tank, told us our field lines were working great and that a possible leaky toilet was most likely the culprit. These guys were so nice, on time, professional, and so helpful. They were quick to offer alternative solutions to help fix the issue rather than just charging us money to fix something that didn't need it. Thank you guys so much for all the help and the smiling faces while doing such a dirty job and in this awful heat! Positive Responsiveness, Quality, Professionalism

reviews.name: Fiona Nelson
reviews.text: I cannot recommend this service highly enough. They were so nice and explained everything to me and explained what I needed to get. I feel bad I didn?t ask their names but he would not take payment for pumping my tank, saying they were in the area. In my 15 years in Alabama I think this is the most helpful company I have dealt with. I am going to order the pump with 100% confidence, knowing how knowledgeable and reliable the people installing it will be! Tommie J Goggans III Tommie J Goggans III I can not say enough good things about AJ's Septic Services. We have used them over the years at three different homes and the work is always done properly and professionally. They are a trustworthy, reliable, and fair family business that still believes that their word is their bond. They always treat my home as if it were their own. Positive Responsiveness, Punctuality, Quality, Professionalism, Value B Campbell B Campbell Very friendly, honest, and reliable! Used them 3 times and will not use any other services. Their employee, Jeremy, was very polite and courteous. He got the job done rather fast and answered any questions I had
